pages.title: The BORG Kindberg
pages.text: The BORG Kindberg is a legendary structure you might find far, far away on your ventures. Within, you will discover the origins of the Alec. Things to find include but aren't limited to:$(li)The Cafeteria's Menu/$$(li)Ulrike Scheucher's office/$$(li)Juri Höfler's favorite literature/$

pages.name: Ulrike Scheucher
pages.text: The one and only Ulrike Scheucher, world's best latin teacher

pages.name: Juri Höfler
pages.text: Juri Höfler, the school's director, not related to Alec
